text: <@U2X9KDDL7> - they should be working in the latest versions of hfc for v0.6
<@U0PB67X4K> Ok, is it just a matter of calling eventHubConnect?
<@U0PB67X4K> Hmm.. is 'dev' mode not working?  I've traced this to the transaction ID being the same as the chaincodeID, which is just a name that I issued -- it's not a hash like it should be.
Is HFC only supported for 'net' mode right now?
it should work just fine in dev mode.  The unit tests actually have a set of tests which run in dev mode as I recall
Hmm.. perhaps, though they appear to depend on the timeout event that is set in order to function.
Let me check that to be sure.
<@U0PB67X4K> Ok, I added some console.log statements to test that and the transaction completion occurs because of the timeout in both deploy and invoke -- this is in both dev and net mode.
